title: Geography of South America: Brazil. - Rev. ed.
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/South America - Social life and customs
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/South America - Description and travel
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Brazil - Economic conditions
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Brazil - Social conditions
description: Designed to show the great variety of urban and rural life styles which exist in Brazil. Depicts life in the vast Amazon Basin, on coffee and cocoa plantations, in the great coastal cities, and in Brazilia. The Brazilian economy is painted in glowing terms. Suitable for lower and middle secondary levels.
